name: The Lab(Early Demo)
description:
This is a game about a red cylinder who was put it a lab for testing. At least that what i got so far. This is a VERY VERY EARLY DEMO and all kinds of criticism are welcome. I do encourage people to find bugs and make suggestions about the story or maybe even how the final game will work. I should also tell you that EVERYTHING in this game is subject to change. Character, story, etc, etc. The plan for how this game is going to go:  it will be a platformer game when you go room to room completing various courses along the way. The lab is basically a labyrinth(get it?) and you will have to achieve the various endings by getting to the end of the lab in different ways. Yes, when final game is out I will eventually spoil the endings and how to get them if someone didn't already.

The bugs i am aware of as of now(I will update this section whenever I or someone else discovers a bug):

         Jumping while directly next to a cube will make the camera spaz out a little bit

         The glitchy ass lighting system
